Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Lost Tales of Greece | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Chalkippe had not seen her Kallistros|brother in some time, and when she went by his farm she heard frightening sounds. Kassandra agreed to check out the distant farm and find out what had happened.'

General_Description: '''Chicken or Egg''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra helped [[Chalkippe]] to check on her brother [[Kallistros]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I think that's everyone Priestess Hexione mentioned. Time to find her again.''

She went over to the priestess.

*'''Priestess Hexione:''' ''Wondrous Eagle Bearer! Your name and glory drop from everyone's lips. My sisters and I wish to throw a grand festival in your honor. You will be the cherished guest.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''If you insist.''
*'''Priestess Hexione:''' ''However, there is one more who could benefit from your attention. Chalkippe frets about her brother. In truth, he is a strange one, touched by madness... or perhaps a chosen of the gods.''
*'''Priestess Hexione:''' ''Ah, here she is now. Speak to her, reassure her, and then we will celebrate!''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''By the gods! It's you!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's me.''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''It's you! By the gods! My prayers are answered!''
*'''Priestess Hexione:''' ''Speak to the Eagle Bearer, my child.''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''You have come to help me!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Um, I'll see what I can do.''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''Yes! Of course! It's my brother, Kallistratos. He's always been a bit odd, but this past year, I think the gods have cursed him. Uh, that is, I don't mean to offend.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Go on. Your brother.''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''My brother's farm is a small way from the village. Always doing his own thing. I haven't seen him for days, but when I went to pass by, I heard terrifying noises! I think something might have happened, but I'm not brave enough to go see.''

(If players choose "I'll look for your brother.")

* '''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take a look for you.''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''Thank you! Thank you, Eagle Bearer! You're too kind! Too generous! Too nice! Thank you!''

(If players choose "What was your brother doing?")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''What can you tell me about your brother?''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''Kallistratos always tries some new scheme or crazy idea. His last one was to breed chickens that would lay giant eggs. "Each egg to feed a family," he said, and he'd sell them far and wide and become rich.''

(If players choose "What do you think happened to him?")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''What do you think happened to Kallistratos?''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''I don't know! Maybe a lion or wolf got into the farm. Terrible noises nearly scared my hair white. I'm sure whatever it is would be no match for you, mighty Eagle Bearer! I pray he's all right,''

(If players choose "Where is the farm?")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where is your brother's farm?''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''He has a large farmstead northeast of here. He doesn't take very good care of it, though. Always caught up in some crazy scheme.''

(If players choose "I'll pass by the farm.")

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll visit your brother's farm and see what's going on.''

Traveling northeast, she used Ikaros to scout the area.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''There he is!''

She reached the farmstead, only for someone to call out.

*'''Kallistratos:''' ''Run for your life! You'll call the Ares Ornithes down upon us!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The what now?''

Approaching, she saw several giant chickens surrounding Kallistratos. They attacked her when she drew close, and she put them down. She approached Kallistratos, who looked upset.

*'''Kallistratos:''' ''Who are you supposed to be?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The ''misthios'' who saved your life? You could say thanks.''
*'''Kallistratos:''' ''Not sure you had to kill my best chickens, though.''

<Tabber>
|-|I saved you because your sister prayed for it.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Watch your tongue, little man. I came on behalf of your sister, who showed proper respect. Don't make me angry.''
|-|I came for Chalkippe. She was worried.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your sister sent me to check on you. Chalkippe was very worried and scared by the noises she heard. Looks like she was right to be concerned.''
</Tabber>

*'''Kallistratos:''' ''So tell her I'm fine, already. Hmm, maybe I can get a goat from [[Messara]] and catch a lion and breed them somehow... Maybe with a snake... I'm sure I could make a fortune...''

Kassandra shrugged and walked away, leaving him to his musings. With the task done, she went to tell Chalkippe the news.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Chalkippe, your brother is... something else. But he's alive and, I suppose, well.''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''Thank you, Eagle Bearer! Yes, he is a difficult one. But you have answered my prayers! I will always be your devoted servant.''

Kassandra backed away.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Uh...''
*'''Chalkippe:''' ''The priestesses have begun preparing a great feast in your honor for all of Linou to celebrate you! It will be magnificent!''

Polykleitos appeared from a doorway.

*'''Polykleitos:''' ''Kassandra! Calamity! Myrto has been struck down by illness!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Take me to her!''

She followed him inside, where Myrto was bedridden.

*'''Polykleitos:''' ''The girl was thriled about the idea of the festival to honor you. She was rushing about, buzzing with excitement, when she suddenly collapsed.''
*'''Akatos:''' ''Please, Eagle Bearer. Can you do anything for her?''

(If players choose "Does Myrto have any wounds?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Did anyone see anything? Does she have any wounds?''
*'''Akatos:''' ''No, no insect or snake bites. But her brow burns with fever.''

(If players choose "What was she doing?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What was Myrto doing when she got sick?''
*'''Akatos:''' ''She was preparing the meat you brought in for the festival, per the priestess's instructions.''

(If players choose "Where is Priestess Hexione?")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Where is Priestess Hexione now?''
*'''Akatos:''' ''I don't know. I overhead her calling out for help, telling people not to be scared, but she's vanished.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's strange behavior.''

(If players choose "I'll ask around and see if anyone saw anything.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll ask around and see if anyone else knows anything. And see if I can't find the priestess.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra answered Chalkippe's prayers, and helped her brother.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
